remarks: 2-variable restricted specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2012.)
statement:
rspc2.1 $e |- F/ x ch $.
rspc2.2 $e |- F/ y ps $.
rspc2.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rspc2.4 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
rspc2 $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A. x e. C A. y e. D ph -> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x $.
$d D x y $.
